articles.title: Man Survives 18 Hours At Sea Clinging To Football Lost By Boys: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A man from North Macedonia in Europe is said to have survived 18 hours at sea by clinging to a toy ball that floated towards him. The man, known only as Ivan, and a companion were caught in strong currents over the weekend off the shore of Myti Beach
articles.content:
Man survived 18 hours at sea by clinging to a toy ball at sea. (Representative Photo)
